posts.post_content: i use it in UR control. Its a cheep beater (and my deck dosnt do anything els turn 1) and in order for the enemy to kill it they have to waste there mana, which could be spent casting spells which i now no longer have to counter kill or bounce for another turn. And thats what control decks are all about, stalling.
